title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 38 - Economic Development Zones-special Rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 38 - Economic Development Zones-special Rules

State Regulations
§ 38.1 - Assessment
§ 38.2 - Unwarranted reduction in utility costs in an empire zone (formerly, economic development zone)
§ 38.3 - Repealed
§ 38.4 to 38.6 - Repealed
§ 38.7 to 38.9 - Repealed
§ 38.10 - Repealed
§ 38.11 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 38

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 475, 509[7], 697, 1096, 1142[1], [8], 1250, 1415[a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
